verbose_text: The increased NO fluxes of IFNgamma activated macrophages allow the following chemistries : (5) 2NO + O2 → 2NO2 (6) NO + NO2 → N2O3 (7) N2O3+ RSH → RSNO+ H+ + NO2 − Since reaction (5) is second order for NO, it follows that N 2 O 3 is only detected in the highly activated macrophages sustaining high NO fluxes.
evidence:
IFNgamma-activated macrophages allow the following chemistries:

(5)2NO + O2→2NO2(6)NO
